# Darwhin Gomez

New York, New York | 347-491-2955  
Darwhin88@gmail.com  | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin) | [GitHub](https://github.com/dw8888)  

## Professional Summary  
Solutions-focused technologist with over 8 years of experience in software engineering and machine learning, specializing in building scalable systems and enhancing user experiences. Proven track record of driving change and leading complex technical projects, with a strong foundation in Python, AWS, and machine learning frameworks. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative application solutions that connect users globally. Eager to leverage my expertise at Meta to advance the way people connect through technology.

## Certifications  
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  

## Education  
**City University of New York – School of Professional Studies**  
Master of Science – Data Science and Machine Learning, GPA 4.0, Expected Jan 2026  

**City University of New York – NYC College of Technology**  
Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems, GPA 3.78, June 2024  
Dean’s List (5x), National Honor Society  

## Professional Experience  
**Solutions Architect Intern**  
Amazon Web Services (AWS) | Arlington, VA (Remote/Hybrid)  
Jun 2025 – Sep 2025  
- Designed and presented secure, scalable AWS architectures tailored to enterprise client needs.  
- Developed proof-of-concept (POC) solutions integrating Generative AI and data analytics to discover actionable business insights.  
- Built and deployed a fully automated sentiment analysis pipeline processing over 1M feedback records, enabling 5× faster feedback-to-action turnaround.  
- Fine-tuned foundational models in Amazon SageMaker, achieving a 5% increase in output accuracy and an 8% reduction in toxicity.  

**Software Developer Intern**  
WOPLLI Technologies | Remote, NY  
Jun 2024 – Sep 2024  
- Designed a Virtual Credential System for decentralized identity ecosystems.  
- Configured and tested Azure environments for application hosting and deployment.  
- Developed API integration and testing scripts using Postman.  

**IT Support Intern**  
Mayor’s Office of Information Services | New York, NY  
Feb 2024 – May 2024  
- Automated troubleshooting workflows via Python scripts to reduce manual workload.  
- Supported VIP users with secure access (Active Directory, VPN, VOIP).  
- Delivered white glove support on over 100 tickets with excellent service reviews.  

**IT Instructor Assistant**  
RF CUNY & Generation USA (Choose-U) | Remote, NY  
Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Delivered 36 lessons covering IT support, Linux, PowerShell, and scripting for 200+ learners.  
- Maintained a 96% cohort graduation rate through data-driven instruction.  

## Technical Projects  
**Alfred – Personal Agentic Job Search Assistant**  
- Developed a personal agentic job search assistant using FastAPI and OpenAI GPT-4.1 for automated resume and cover letter generation.  
- Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using PostgreSQL to store and retrieve personal work data as embeddings.  
- Reduced time required to apply to job postings by 60% and increased completed applications per week by 300%.  

## Technical Skills  
- **Cloud:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue, QuickSight, SageMaker)  
- **Data & ML:** Python (pandas, scikit-learn, PyTorch), SQL, NoSQL  
- **AI:** Generative AI (LLMs), Model Experimentation  
- **Security:** SIEM, IDS, Active Directory  
- **Developer Tools:** Git, Docker  

## Languages  
- English (Fluent)  
- Spanish (Fluent)  

## Professional Communities  
- Society of Hispanic Professional Engineers  
- NYC HackR – Data & AI Meetup Community  
- CUNY SPS AI Club
